alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 17 at 11:01PM CDT until June 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Butler County in south central Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Derby, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Wichita and Rose Hill around 1105 PM CDT. Eastborough, Mcconnell Air Force Base and East Wichita around 1110 PM CDT. Andover and Northeast Wichita around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Jabara Airport and Augusta Municipal Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 46 and 56. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
